name: mapstack
description: モダンな学習プラットフォーム MapStack のモノレポリポジトリ

scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose run --rm backend alembic upgrade head
scripts.test: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run test" "cd backend && pytest"
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run test:watch" "cd backend && pytest --watch"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint" "docker-compose run --rm backend ruff check ."
scripts.format: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run format" "docker-compose run --rm backend ruff format ."
scripts.build: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run build" "cd backend && echo 'Backend build'"
